title: Seeing red and feeling blue
creator_credit: Film Australia, Suzanne Baker and Jane Oehr
brief_description: Provides basic information about reproduction and aspects of menstruation, and probes emotional responses on many aspects of womanhood. The Women’s Theatre Group of Melbourne performs improvisations and satirical sketches which comment on many of society’s prevailing attitudes towards sex education and women.
